metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3402 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow and several buffer overflow reads in libyara/modules/macho/macho.c in YARA v4.0.3 and earlier could allow an attacker to either cause denial of service or information disclosure via a malicious Mach-O file. Affects all versions before libyara 4.0.4

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara10 - 4.2.3-1
yara - 4.2.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.3-1').
